name: df-lsm
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(clsm, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpo(s1, s2, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), crn(cmpo(s3, s4, cv(s1), cv(s2), co(cv(s3), cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), cv(s4)))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ LSSum =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà P((Base ` s0)), s2 ‚àà P((Base ` s0))‚Ü¶ ran((s3 ‚àà s1, s4 ‚àà s2 ‚Ü¶(s3[(+ ` s0)]s4)))))
comment: Define subgroup sum (inner direct product of subgroups). (Contributed by NM, 28-Jan-2014.)
